text: V svoyom upryamstve mnogobozhniki doshli do togo, chto govoryat: "Yesli by proroku bylo nisposlano ot Allakha drugoye chudo, krome Korana!" Skazhi im, o prorok: "Prichina vashego neveriya zaklyuchayetsya ne v tom, chto net dostatochnykh znameniy i chudes, a v vashem zabluzhdenii. Allakh Vsevyshniy ne napravlyayet na pravil'nyy put', kogo zhelayet, yesli tot idot po puti zabluzhdeniya, i vedot k pravil'nomu puti istiny tekh, kotoryye vsegda obrashchayutsya k Nemu s pokayaniyem, prosya proshcheniya
